overview: Everybody thinks angels are sweet and innocent, but wait until you see these angels. They're so naughty, they traded in their wings for horns. Each fresh face is a brand new amateur waiting to be discovered. Meet our heavenly cast, featuring the anxious Angel, sexy Sandy Knight, talented Tawny Roberts, just amazing Jennifer Steele, nasty Nefertiti, and the magical Meriesa. These girls will get you so hot, you'll feel like you're floating on a cloud.
title: Amateur Angels 2
